text: mariyu okavela memu ataniki apada kalam dati poyina tarvata ma karunyanni ruci cupiste atadu tappakunda ila antadu: "Idi na hakke! Mariyu punarut'thana dinam vastundani nenu bhavincanu. Mariyu okavela nenu na prabhuvu vaddaku maralimpabadina! Niscayanga, naku ayana daggara mele untundi." Kani memu satyatiraskarulaku varu cesina karmalanu gurinci variki tappaka teluputamu mariyu variki bhayankaramaina siksanu ruci cupistamu
